text: 'Into Colour' is the third album by the British singer-songwriter Rumer. It was released on 10 November 2014. ==Singles== * "Dangerous" was the first single released from the album. * Billboard premiered "Reach Out" in the United States via streaming on 23 January 2015.Leight, Elias (23 January 2015). "Exclusive Premiere: Listen to Rumer's Gorgeous 'Reach Out'". Billboard.
